metadata.title: CVE-2020-15275 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
MoinMoin is a wiki engine. In MoinMoin before version 1.9.11, an attackerwith write permissions can upload an SVG file that contains maliciousjavascript. This javascript will be executed in a user's browser when theuser is viewing that SVG file on the wiki. Users are strongly advised toupgrade to a patched version. MoinMoin Wiki 1.9.11 has the necessary fixesand also contains other important fixes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-moinmoin - 1.9.9-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moin package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.9-1ubuntu1.2').
